description: We are in the Agnelli showroom, a well-known manufacturer of cookware for professional kitchens. The modern shop is located on the ground floor, while the first floor hosts the restaurant with its elegant tables in a refined minimalist and contemporary environment. On the menu, disheswith an impressive balance of ingredients, including occasionally exotic choices.
